mapper.insert:
select app_process_status_seq.nextval as id from dual
MERGE INTO app_process_status dest USING (SELECT #{processTypeId} processTypeId, #{processHeaderId} processHeaderId, #{receiptId} receiptId FROM dual) src ON ( (dest.processTypeId = src.processTypeId AND dest.processHeaderId = src.processHeaderId AND dest.receiptId = src.receiptId) ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET title=#{title},updateUserId=#{updateUserId},updateUserCode=#{updateUserCode},updateUserName=#{updateUserName},updateDate=#{updateDate},processStepId=#{processStepId},processStepCode=#{processStepCode},processStepType=#{processStepType},processStepVersion=#{processStepVersion},subjects=#{subjects},subjectType=#{subjectType} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id,receiptId,title,code,processTypeId,processHeaderId,processStepId,processStepCode,processStepType,processStepVersion,subjects,subjectType,orgId,orgName,createUserId,createUserCode,createUserName,createDate) VALUES (#{id},#{receiptId},#{title},#{code},#{processTypeId},#{processHeaderId},#{processStepId},#{processStepCode},#{processStepType},#{processStepVersion},#{subjects},#{subjectType},#{orgId},#{orgName},#{createUserId},#{createUserCode},#{createUserName},#{createDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM app_process_status WHERE processTypeId = #{processTypeId} AND processHeaderId=#{processHeaderId} AND receiptId=#{receiptId}

mapper.update: UPDATE app_process_status SET receiptId=#{previousReceiptId} WHERE processTypeId = #{processTypeId} AND processHeaderId=#{processHeaderId} AND receiptId=#{currentReceiptId}
